original_text: Jesus answered, ‘You know that there are 12 hours in the day. Anyone who walks during the day will not fall down. He will not fall down because he sees this world's light.
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하시되 낮이 열두 시간이 아니냐 사람이 낮에 다니면 이 세상의 빛을 보므로 실족하지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: You know that there are 12 hours in the day
sentences.korean_translation: 낮에는 12시간이 있다는 것을 너희는 알고 있다

sentences.original_text: Anyone who walks during the day
because he sees this world's light
